cigaretteLicenseConfirmation.issuingAgency: **Issuing Agency:**Â NJ Division of Revenue and Enterprise Services
cigaretteLicenseConfirmation.needHelpInfo: Please contact DORES by [submitting a General Inquiry Form](https://www.nj.gov/treasury/revenue/revgencode.shtml).
cigaretteLicenseConfirmation.paymentSuccessfulInfo: Your application has been submitted to the NJ Division of Revenue and Enterprise Services (DORES) for review.
cigaretteLicenseConfirmation.whatHappensNextBullet1: If approved, your license will be included with the letter.
cigaretteLicenseConfirmation.whatHappensNextBullet2: If denied, the letter will explain the reasons for denial and how to re-apply.
cigaretteLicenseConfirmation.whatHappensNextInfo: DORES will review your application and send a decision letter to the mailing address you provided.
